channel.title: REcruiting coders for a 317 Full 06 scape!
channel.description:
Im looking for a couple of coders who want to help bring back 2006 scape, i am not much of a coder myself but i can offer up the money to host and advertise to make this the best 06 server out there! if you're interested add me on skype : alpha.scape
we can talk more about it in depth over there!

item.title: REcruiting coders for a 317 Full 06 scape!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

If you’re looking for a team, Post in the Development Teams section. To get even a little interest though, you should check out the existing posts.

Read full topic
item.source: REcruiting coders for a 317 Full 06 scape!

item.title: REcruiting coders for a 317 Full 06 scape!
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

[quote=“strucker, post:3, topic:478190”][quote author=luna-scape link=topic=596388.msg4199281#msg4199281 date=1357945202]
Aother remake…

I just get the idea that a lot of people here about vault and thinks:
Holy shit i want to make that cash amount asswell.

My advice for you is: make something unique

(Developpers)
[/quote]hey luna :)[/quote]
Hey
